avalancheActivity.highlights: New snow in mountains can be unstable. Older snow is considered stable

snowpackStructure.highlights: New snow on Monday as well as Saturday and Sunday. Older snow is considered stable. The new snow could get unstable when it gets warmer on Tuesday and in the sunshine. Were it accumulates, especially high in mountains, thin unstable slabs can form. Only small avalanches are expected.

travelAdvisory.comment: It has snowed a bit in most parts of the country and small slabs could be present at high elevations. Chances of wet avalanches in south Iceland.
travelAdvisory.highlights: It has snowed a bit in most parts of the country and small slabs could be present at high elevations. Chances of wet avalanches in south Iceland.

weatherForecast.highlights: Snýst í SV-átt seint á mánudagskvöld. Hýnar á þriðjudag, smávegis skúrir en snjókoma í hæstu fjöll. A-átt og rigning á miðvikudag.

avalancheActivity.comment: Wet slab in Naustahvilft 19th of March.
avalancheActivity.highlights: New snow in mountains can be unstable especially when it gets warmer on Tuesday. Older snow is considered stable.

snowpackStructure.highlights: New snow on Monday in E wind and this weekend in light SW- and W-wind. Older snow is expected to be stable. The new snow could be unstable where it accumulates. The snow can get less stable when it gets warmer on Tuesday. Only small avalanches are expected.

travelAdvisory.comment: It has snowed a bit in most parts of the country and small slabs could be present at high elevations. Chances of wet avalanches in south Iceland.
travelAdvisory.highlights: It has snowed a bit in most parts of the country and small slabs could be present at high elevations. Chances of wet avalanches in south Iceland.

weatherForecast.highlights: Snjókoma á mánudagskvöld og aðfaranótt þriðjudags í A-lægri átt. Snýst í SV-átt á þriðjudag og hlýnar, skúrir en snjókoma til fjalla. Snýst í hvassa NA-átt á miðvikudag með rigningu en snjókomu til fjalla.

avalancheActivity.highlights: Some new snow is in the area and small slabs could be present at high elevations. Snow has settled in recent days, but older wind slabs might still remain at higher elevations.

snowpackStructure.highlights: Some new snow in the area in high mountains, on top of the old snow which was considered mostly stable. Small slabs could form on most aspects. Some old wind slabs could be present in gullies and depressions at higher elevations. New snow expected in the next few days and windslab can form in E to N aspects on Tuesday and S to W aspects on Wednesday and Thursday.

travelAdvisory.comment: It has snowed a bit in most parts of the country and small slabs could be present at high elevations. Chances of wet avalanches in south Iceland.
travelAdvisory.highlights: It has snowed a bit in most parts of the country and small slabs could be present at high elevations. Chances of wet avalanches in south Iceland.

weatherForecast.highlights: SV-átt og él/slydduél til fjalla á þriðjudag, snýr í A/NA átt á miðvikudag og fimmtudag og lítilsháttar snjókoma.

avalancheActivity.highlights: Little or no snow at low elevations and hard packed snow in the mountains with a thin cover of new snow. Softer snow is present in ravines and depressions.

snowpackStructure.highlights: Little or no snow is at low elevations and hard packed snow is in the mountains with a thin cover of new snow. Snow is considered mostly stable. The new snow could drift to southeasterly aspects. Small sluffs could release in the sun on Tuesday.

travelAdvisory.comment: It has snowed a bit in most parts of the country and small slabs could be present at high elevations. Chances of wet avalanches in south Iceland.
travelAdvisory.highlights: It has snowed a bit in most parts of the country and small slabs could be present at high elevations. Chances of wet avalanches in south Iceland.

weatherForecast.highlights: Suðlæg átt og bjart veður á þriðjudag, snýr í A/NA átt á mið/fim með snjókomu til fjalla fyrst um sinn en svo éljum.
